entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Otherwise clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 5:13 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
